text: so this is a calendar that I need Mike
in Afghanistan or to take to Afghanistan
actually so i think i actually started
in march there we go from my whole
deployment warrant Marshall yeah I guess
to tell the whole story we first met
when we were just toddlers Mike was the
only boy in the all girls play group we
grew up in separate towns and then it
was first day of senior year of high
school I was in class with this
beautiful young lady and it was like
wait I think I know who she is I think I
hung out with her when I was like two
we've pretty much been together ever
since after college I joined the army
it's what his father and his grandfather
had done my relationship with my dad was
I was his best friend he's my best
friend as well and I considered him the
smartest person I ever knew when he
passed away it was not expected Mike
wasn't there he was training in
Louisiana and I got the call in the
middle of the night from his mom and
then I was able to go to the hospital
and be with his brothers and his mom it
was horrible I felt for Mike who now had
to deal with all of these adult things
that we had never really had to deal
with before my older brother told me how
great Katie was dealing with everything
because I wasn't able to be there the
night that my father passed away I
realized that this was something bigger
than what did it ever been before and
then I knew that I could never not be
with him so that was one of those
moments where I realized how much Katie
really meant to me
